review: Fire TV Stick is alright.  I have not tried the Roku, but it is better than the Chrome Stick in my opinion.  However, this product is terrible unless you buy some sort of hdmi extender.  It does not connect to the WiFi very well unless pointed in the direction of the router.  I was very displeased with this product until I purchased (Aurum Ultra Series - High Speed HDMI Extension Cable Male - Female (10 feet) With Ethernet - Supports 3D and Audio Return Channel).
